verses.roman:
svarūpa-gosāñi tabe sei śloka paḍila
śuni' sabākāra citte camatkāra haila

synonyms: svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosāñi; tabe—then; sei—that; śloka paḍila—recited the verse; śuni'-hearing this; sabākāra—of all of them; citte—in the minds; camatkāra haila—there was great wonder.
translation: Then Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī recited the verse, and when all the devotees heard it, their minds were struck with wonder.
